meanings.definition: The quality of being blatant or obvious.
meanings.sent1: The blatancy of his lies was impossible to ignore.
meanings.sent2: The blatancy of the neon sign made it easy to find the store.
meanings.sent3: The blatancy of the clown's outfit made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The blatancy of the warning signs could not be missed.
meanings.sent5: The blatancy of the red stop sign caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The act of being flagrant or conspicuous.
meanings.sent1: She was shocked by the blatancy of his disregard for the rules.
meanings.sent2: The blatancy of his actions drew unwanted attention.
meanings.sent3: The blatancy of the fashion faux pas made heads turn.
meanings.sent4: The blatancy of the graffiti on the wall was a bold statement.
meanings.sent5: The blatancy of the error in the report was embarrassing.
